document_data.name: Salambra
document_data.mainbody: '''Salambra''' the she-wolf of [[Surthay]] was a woman from [[Thay]], renowned for her beauty.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1372}}, the palace guard [[Thaergar]] of [[Aglarond]] had a pack of playing cards featuring the likeness of the greatest beauties of [[Thay]]. One of these cards featured a picture of Salambra. He gave his belt with those to [[the Simbul]]; one of the sorceresses under her command, [[Phaeldara]], returned the belt with its playing cards shortly after.
